name: TinyCheckbox

border.description: Whether or not to display a border

checked.description: This option is selected by default

false-label.description: There is no value when checked

indeterminate.description: Set the indeterminate state, which is only responsible for style control
indeterminate.description_zh: 设置 indeterminate 状态，只负责样式控制

label.description: The value of the selected state (only valid in checkbox-group or if the binding object type is array)
label.description_zh: 选中状态的值（只有在 checkbox-group 中或者绑定对象类型为 array 时有效）

size.description: checkbox, which is only valid if the border is true
size.description_zh: checkbox 的尺寸，仅在 border 为真时有效

text.description: The text displayed by the checkbox

events.name: change
events.description: An event that is triggered when a binding value changes
events.description_zh: 当绑定值变化时触发的事件

description: 用于配置不同场景的选项，提供用户可在一组选项中进行多选。
description_zh: 用于配置不同场景的选项，提供用户可在一组选项中进行多选。
